alert.note: Alert for Carter; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 3:23PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Carter and western Wayne Counties through 345 PM CST... At 323 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garwood, or 9 miles east of Van Buren, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Piedmont around 340 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Missouri.
